Sentencas: Four Fe-17Cr alloys with various Mn contents between 0.0 and 3.0 wt.% are prepared for investigation of the effect of Mn content on the oxidation behavior and electrical conductivity of the Fe-Cr alloys for the application of metallic interconnects in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: The effect of Mn on the oxidation behavior and electrical conductivity of Fe-17Cr alloys in solid oxide fuel cell cathode atmosphere

Sentencas: During the initial oxidation stage (within 1 min) at 750 degrees C in air, Cr is preferentially oxidized to form a layer of Cr2O3 type oxide in all the alloys, regardless the Mn content, with similar oxidation rate and oxide morphology.
Titulo: The effect of Mn on the oxidation behavior and electrical conductivity of Fe-17Cr alloys in solid oxide fuel cell cathode atmosphere

Sentencas: The subsequent oxidation of the Mn containing alloys is accelerated caused by the fast outward diffusion of Mn ions across the Cr2O3 type oxide layer to form Mn-rich (Mn, Cr)(3)O-4 and Mn2O3 oxides on the top.
Titulo: The effect of Mn on the oxidation behavior and electrical conductivity of Fe-17Cr alloys in solid oxide fuel cell cathode atmosphere

Sentencas: After 700h oxidation a multi-layered oxide scale is observed in the Mn containing alloys, which corresponds to a multi-stage oxidation kinetics in the alloys containing 0.5 and 1.0 wt.% of Mn.
Titulo: The effect of Mn on the oxidation behavior and electrical conductivity of Fe-17Cr alloys in solid oxide fuel cell cathode atmosphere

Sentencas: The oxidation rate and ASR of the oxide scale increase with the Mn content in the alloy changes from 0.0 to 3.0 wt.%.
Titulo: The effect of Mn on the oxidation behavior and electrical conductivity of Fe-17Cr alloys in solid oxide fuel cell cathode atmosphere

Sentencas: For the application of metallic interconnects in SOFCs, Mn-free Fe-17Cr alloy with conducting Cr free spinet coatings is preferred.
Titulo: The effect of Mn on the oxidation behavior and electrical conductivity of Fe-17Cr alloys in solid oxide fuel cell cathode atmosphere
